question: وَأَتْبَعْنَاهُمْ
answer: And We caused to follow them

question: فَخَسَفْنَا
answer: Then We caused to swallow up

question: لَخَسَفَ
answer: He would have caused it to swallow us

question: خَطْبُكُمَا
answer: (is the) matter with both of you

question: الدَّارِ
answer: the good end in the Hereafter

question: يَسْتَصْرِخُهُ
answer: cried out to him for help

question: عَاقِبَةُ
answer: the good end in the Hereafter

question: فَوَكَزَهُ
answer: so Musa struck him with his fist
